message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $115. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $110? This would be my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $108. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
